mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, YYYY, YYYYMM, YYYYMMDD, PRODUCTID, PRODUCTNAME, CATEGORYID, OPER1, OPER2, OPER3, OPER4, OPER5, OPER6, ORDERID, ORDERPRICE, SKUSELLPRICE, ORDERNUM, SKUALLPRICE, ORDEREXPRESSRATE, SKUEXPRESSRATE, EBAYORDERRATE, EBAYSKURATE, ORDERPAYPALRATE, SKUPAYPALRATE, ORDERWEIGHT, EXPRESSTYPEID, EXPRESSTYPE, ORDEREXPRESSTYPERATE, SKUEXPRESSTYPERATE, PRODUCTWEIGHT, PRODUCTLOCATIONID, MANUFACTURE, MANUFACTUREID, PRODUCTSTORAGE, PRODUCTSTATUS, PRODUCTCOSTPRICE, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, SHOPTYPE, SHOPTYPEID from STAT_PRODUCTDETIL_DAILY where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
